name: CASA Reference
author: Tom Russell

sections.description:
This plugin is intended to provide a simple bibliography management tool, creating a ‘reference’ post and associating it with posts or pages.

Usage:

  • Create a new reference from ‘References’ in the admin sidebar.
  • Edit a page, add a reference using the ‘References’ metabox.
  • A list of properly-formatted references will be appended to the content of the page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-casa-reference directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
